alert.note: Alert for Dickinson; Iron (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 12 at 12:35PM EDT until April 18 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Michigan...Wisconsin... Menominee River near McAllister affecting Menominee and Marinette Counties. Menominee River near Florence affecting Iron, Florence and Dickinson Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Michigan...Wisconsin... Menominee River near Niagara affecting Menominee, Florence, Marinette and Dickinson Counties. For the Menominee River...including Florence, Vulcan, Niagara, McAllister...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE THURSDAY NIGHT TO TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Menominee River near Florence. * WHEN...From late Thursday night to Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Flood waters reach a few homes and cottages along Runbers Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 6.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Friday morning to a crest of 10.3 feet early Saturday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight.
